verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> to my Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Sit <S%H3427><s%> at my right hand, <S%H3225><s%> until I make <S%H7896><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> your footstool for your feet. <S%H1916><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> forth the rod <S%H4294><s%> of your strength <S%H5797><s%> out of Zion. <S%H6726><s%> Rule <S%H7287><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of your enemies. <S%H341><s%>

Your people <S%H5971><s%> offer themselves willingly <S%H5071><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your power, <S%H2428><s%> in holy <S%H6944><s%> array. <S%H1926><s%> Out of the womb <S%H7358><s%> of the morning, <S%H4891><s%> you have the dew <S%H2919><s%> of your youth. <S%H3208><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has sworn, <S%H7650><s%> and will not change <S%H5162><s%> his mind: <S%H3548><s%> "You are a priest forever <S%H5769><s%> in the order <S%H1700><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%H4442><s%>"
The Lord <S%H136><s%> is at your right hand. <S%H3225><s%> He will crush <S%H4272><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his wrath. <S%H639><s%>

He will judge <S%H1777><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%> He will heap <S%H4390><s%> up dead bodies. <S%H1472><s%> He will crush <S%H4272><s%> the ruler <S%H7218><s%> of the whole <S%H7227><s%> earth. <S%H776><s%>
He will drink <S%H8354><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%> in the way; <S%H1870><s%> therefore he will lift up <S%H7311><s%> his head. <S%H7218><s%>
